```python
Element=driver.find_element_by_id(ElementID)
print(Element)
print(Element.text)
```

The output is as follows:

```python
<selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement object at 0x9c2392c>
```
I know that the element has content as I have just input some data into it using the .sendkeys command. I can also see the content on the webpage while the script runs. However, I am unable to retrieve the contents of the element. I want a solution that can be applied generically to retrieve contents from various types of elements.
